name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3
description:
Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3 is a fighting game developed by DIMPS. It came out on 16-11-2004. It was published by Atari. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3 is available on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Hiroshi Matsumoto and Takashi Tsukamoto. It was directed by Yutaka Fujimoto. Hironobu Inagaki scored the game.
